text: The are film-specific prizes awarded solely by the Nikkan Sports. == Categories == *Best Film *Best Foreign Film *Best Director *Best Actor *Best Actress *Best Supporting Actor *Best Supporting Actress *Best Newcomer *Special Award *Yūjirō Ishihara Award *Yūjirō Ishihara Newcomer Award ==External links== * * List of awards on IMDB Category:Awards established in 1988 Category:Japanese film awards Category:1988 establishments in Japan Category:Recurring events established in 1988
title: Nikkan Sports Film Award
